pageContext.claim: “Remember this, we, altogether, we, I, we, ran one time and we're one and all, you know, but it was a big one. Now we're going to have a second time, we're going to have another one, and then we'll drive them crazy, you're ready? And maybe, if we really like it a lot and if things keep going like they go on we'll go and we'll do what we have to do. We'll do a three and four or five [terms].”
pageContext.analysis: The Constitution sets a two-term limit for presidents.
